thread.title: How the Benghazi attacks sparked a political war of words PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: How the Benghazi attacks sparked a political war of words | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: How the Benghazi attacks sparked a political war of words PBS NewsHour
text: Former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton goes before a congressional committee Thursday to offer testimony on the attacks that killed four people at the U.S. consulate and CIA compound in Benghazi, Libya. Chief foreign affairs correspondent Margaret Warner reviews the details of the attack and the subsequent investigations.
